responses.rationale: Describes future resolution ('will resolve itself very quickly') without explicit calming.
Describes past response measures ('quickly reined in and stamped out') factually.
Describes future resolution and ongoing capability ('new pullets coming into production') without explicit calming.
Describes future elimination capability ('will be able to eliminate this') based on conditions.
Does not describe capability, preparedness, future possibility, or safeguard.
Does not describe capability, preparedness, future possibility, or safeguard.
Does not describe capability, preparedness, future possibility, or safeguard.
Expresses a hopeful outlook/future possibility ('encouraged about tuberculosis').
